testsuite.name: Test @focus and pending together (both @pending and x:pending)

testcase.name: an unfocused erroneous scenario in x:pending must be Pending it would throw an error if it were not Pending
a focused Success scenario in x:pending must execute the test and return Success
an erroneous scenario with @pending must be Pending it would throw an error if it were not Pending
a Success scenario with both @pending and @focus (not recommended as ambiguous) must execute the test and return Success
a non-pending erroneous scenario alongside a focused scenario must be Pending it would throw an error if it were not Pending
a focused Success scenario alongside another focused scenario must execute the test and return Success
